name: SnakeJs
description:
Guide the snake through hard levels. SnakeJs is a lightweight JavaScript game.

  • Arrows - move the snake.
  • Esc - Can return to home screen anytime.
  • Spacebar - to quickly go through options
  • P - Pause the game ( in paid app atm. )

Full version contains everything unlocked. Can be played on any OS with a web browser.
